com.sun.grizzly.http
Class FileCache

java.lang.Object
  com.sun.grizzly.http.FileCache

public class FileCache
extends Object

This class implements a file caching mechanism used to cache static resources.

Author:
Jeanfrancois Arcand, Scott Oaks
